A gifted football player, Inky was on his way to this dream -- playing college football & getting named a definite First Round NFL Draft pick, but tragedy struck when he was just 10 games away from the NFL. What happened next will inspire you to never give up on your dreams, no matter the obstacles you might encounter.

programme.title: Surviving A Death March
programme.desc: Forced to march over 350 miles, Gerda Weissmann Klein was moments away from sub-zero death when she survived the impossible. How did Gerda fight to survive when fewer than 120 people came out alive? And what simple gesture restored her faith in humanity?

programme.title: David Goggins: The Toughest Man On Earth
programme.desc: Athlete, speaker and soldier David Goggins is known as the toughest man on the planet. Everybody thinks he’s Superman but his internal battle was tearing him apart. In this video, he opens up about a secret he hid from the world and why he feels the need to speak his truth. We hope you enjoy this inspirational short documentary.

programme.title: Brian Bushway: Blind Sports
programme.desc: Record breaking mountain biker Brian Bushway became totally blind at the age of 14. He went from being an active teen outdoors to depression and uncertainty. He never thought he would be able to ride his bike again, until he developed a superpower that allowed him to see.

programme.title: Dr. Edith Edgar: Dancing with the Devil

programme.title: Embrace the Suck
programme.desc: Navy SEAL veteran David Goggins shares how he overcame so many debilitating obstacles to later achieve incredible military and personal honors, and the mentality that kept him going and made him push beyond his limits.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: Re-Boot Your IRA
programme.desc: Are you neglecting one of the most precious assets that you have? When it comes to individual retirement accounts or IRAs, many people have a practice of ""fund it and forget it"". But there are strategies you can implement to help maximize the money it generates. The ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA, will help you Re-Boot Your IRA

programme.title: Good Tax Planning Can Save You HOW Much?!
programme.desc: "The single biggest retirement planning mistake to avoid, the problem with tax professionals, and answers to some of the most frequently asked retirement questions we get on YMYW: should you name a trust as beneficiary on your retirement accounts? What s the break-even point on a Roth conversion? What if you don t have the money to pay the tax when you convert to Roth? Plus, find out the eye-opening amount of money good tax planning can save you! Someone has to be very knowledgeable, entertaining, and special to make it as a guest on YMYW these days, and today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 489, the IRA guru Ed Slott, CPA from IRAHelp.com joins Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA to discuss all of these topics, along with changes to stretch IRAs and required minimum distributions from the SECURE Act and SECURE 2.0 Act."

programme.title: Why Do Tech Companies Hire and Fire So Much
programme.desc: "The big tech companies have been on a firing spree in the past six month. Googles parent company Alphabet recently announced that they would be cutting 12,000 jobs globally, Microsoft has already laid off 10,000 workers, and Amazon is getting rid of 18,000 workers the largest job cut in the companys 29-year history. Those are just the companies that are doing well Facebook is laying off 13 of its workforce because their big play on the metaverse has failed to excite investors and then there is twitter which laid off half of its workforce and then hired some of them back and then fired them again. Times are tough for businesses and executives are being pressured by investors to make cuts wherever they can. The easiest and quickest way for businesses to save on expenses is to cut out new projects and lay off the staff working on them. There three reasons that tech companies in particular hire so many people and three reasons why they fire so many people just as quickly. The first reason they had so many employees to begin with is because the largest employers in the tech space have been on a diversification spree. The largest tech companies (with the exception of Amazon which employs a large amount of workers in its distribution centers) can run with much smaller crews than they currently do. Software is highly scalable, a single developer can produce an application that is downloaded by millions of people, which is impossible for any other type of business. Compare a company like Meta to a Company like Walmart and the difference is clear, Walmart has a similar market cap but employs twenty-five times as many staff, mostly in its stores and warehouses across the country. The only other industry that comes close is the pharmaceutical industry with research and development teams that create medicines that can be mass produced once they get through the FDA approval process. However, companies like Microsoft, Meta, Alphabet, Amazon and Apple have all hired a lot of extra staff that they dont need to run their busines

programme.title: The Golden Age of Fraud & The Bankruptcy Boom
programme.desc: With the collapse of FTX, the conviction of Elizabeth Holmes and the widespread rejection of everything NFT all happening within the space of a month, financial fraud is once again big news, and it should be because it is costing you your financial future. This is not your imagination either, incidents of identity theft, wire fraud, investment scams, pump and dumps, Ponzi schemes, phishing attacks, and sophisticated hacks are all at all time highs. Fraud cost Americans a total of 5.8 BILLION dollars in 2021, and most trackers suggest that number will be even greater this year. these stories can be easy to ignore because the victims of these crimes often had to, frankly, be pretty stupid and financially illiterate to get caught up in them. Anybody who has been anywhere near the internet in the last 20 years should know by now you don’t send money to Nigerian princes with yahoo email accounts or corporate executives playing league of legends during an investor meeting. It’s all pretty common-sense stuff, and you might then incorrectly assume that the rise in fraud is of no concern to you. When you really think about it that 5.8 Billion dollar figure sounds bad, until you work out that that’s only $17.50 per American for an entire year, not to flex too hard but I have spent more on a Starbucks coffee before. It’s hard to see how such a small cost could be doing something as severe as costing young Americans their financial futures, but it is.

programme.desc: The Realm brings you the ultimate documentation of freeriding‚Äôs relentless revolution. Explore Jackson Hole, Alaska, Utah, Japan, British Columbia, Europe, New Zealand, and Hawaii's Jaws.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Rideau Canal - Part 2
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he continues his houseboat and kayak trip along the Rideau River. Ken is joined by his wife and daughter, as they paddle through the locks of the canal and enjoy some quality family time on the water.

programme.title: Out Of Frame
programme.desc: Out Of Frame shows the daily life of Mathis Dumas, athlete, high mountain guide and outdoor photographer. A life suspended in the void, a camera in hand, Mathis takes us behind the scenes of a vertiginous highline shoot on a line never done before. A journey to the heart of the Mont Blanc massif where Mathis reveals his photographic vision and his mountain heritage outside the traditional framework.

programme.title: One For The Road
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: Legacy - Surfing Now & Then
programme.desc: As the sport grows, more and more people surf. Do the surfing legends still relate to what pro surfing has become? Will surfing be as mainstream as other sports? Can you teach the Aloha Spirit to mainlanders and surfers from new demographics? Meet the surfing pioneers while they compete for a World Title in the Azores islands and get to know their views on what is still to come.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: TRANSMIGRATION
programme.desc: Curtis (Andrew Treglia), an American looking for an escape to a foreign land, joins his estranged Brazilian biologist brother Francis (Giovanni Arajo) on a spontaneous journey to find a rare jungle beetle in the Amazon. While hiking, Curtis is bitten by a snake. As he enters a venom induced hallucinogenic dream the two brothers are captured as slaves by a fantasy tribe of Amazonian women, and given to the tribal queen (Fernanda Santana). With the aid of another slave (Pericles Anarcos), Curtis must plot a rescue of Francis and their escape, unless he finds his new situation better than the life he left behind.

programme.title: IN THE HOUR OF VICTORY
programme.desc: Untouched for fifty years, a family finds a bundle of letters setting them on a journey into their past, and the rediscoveryof a tragic love story amid the turmoil of World War II. Bermudian, Major Toby Smith lost his life at the Battleof Overloon during the final Allied push for victory. This film weaves a haunting portrait etched in Tobys own words

programme.title: FINDING CALLARO
programme.desc: The once beautiful and lush Planet Kepler is now dry and near death, after its precocious Callaro plant was exploited to extinction by Earthers because the Callaro plant was known throughout the galaxy as a source of super energy. In this outer space 3-D animated adventure reminiscent of JIMMY NEUTRON and AVATAR, three brave Kepler SpaceKids, Axel, Jono, and Gaga, want to rebuild their desolate planet by following the ancient legend of the lost Callaro oasis. Axel leads his friends into danger as they battle evil Earthers, giant spaceships, and destructive Robots as they journey down the depths of a volcano to retrieve the last Callaro seed and try to save the planet.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 21
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 56
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Interview with Ethirneechal Chanakya
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Mewmews Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: ZoonicornsIntheZooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: DOGGONE DAY
programme.desc: Things are normal at Hotel California- and just as crazy- as Chai Raja serves up teas and Sundar tries to keep the frisky Basha at bay. But then turns up a hulk of a man who is brusque and curt- yet Chai Raja is impressed as he seems to be ex-military. However, Sundars accidentally trips on the mans kit which is burstingwith dog-catching equipment. Freaking out, Sundar tries all zany disguises so that the dogcatcher doesnt figure out that he is in fact a dog- which would have probably worked....if not for dependably wily Basha. The monkey repeatedly botches up Sundars attempts as Chai Raja scratches his head trying to figure out when he had hired such a plethora of ill-dressed waiters and where in chais name, was Sundar?! The dog catcher ultimately sniffs out Sundars existence and eagerly tries to nab him. In an unusual show of affection, Chai Raja refuses to hand over Sundar. But the dog catcher is stubborn and lurks around laying traps. Basha helps by purposely leading Sundar toward the traps. It would have been his last day at the shop for Sundar, but for Basha accidentally setting off a trap too early and the dogcatcher getting caught in one of his own traps. As the medics haul him off and Basha pouts, Sundar chuckles and starts swabbing the floor with gusto.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: XIAS BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Just A Days Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Gold Ax and Silver Ax
programme.desc: Hardworking woodsman GoGo loses his only Ax in the pond. GoGos cry for help summons the Mountain Spirit, who rewards for his honesty. Another greedy woodsman UGo hears the story, and heads to the pond himself.

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Pencil
programme.desc: After scribbling away lets come up with some fun DIY ideas

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Pizza Box
programme.desc: After a nice hearty meal, lets get DIY-ing with Hepi and Briko

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: Straw
programme.desc: Reduce waste by giving straws a second more fun life!

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Socks
programme.desc: Not just to keep your feet warm, Hepi and Briko have some interesting sock themed ideas

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Brother Ogre – Puss In Boots Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called out by his fiancée, a very refined cat who is the pet of the PRINCESS in the story. The wedding between the MARQUIS OF CARABAS and the PRINCESS is very close, but the MARQUIS and his CAT have disappeared. SANDRA and FO go to the OGRE’s castle in which the quick-witted cat and his master now live, and discover that a second OGRE, the brother of the first one, who PUSS IN BOOTS ate after convincing him to turn himself into a mouse, has imprisoned inside the castle.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Om Thum - The Wild Party
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the tale of TOM THUMB, having been called out by his brothers and sisters. Once there, SANDRA soon realises that they have arrived after the happy end of the tale. TOM THUMBs family is now living comfortably thanks to the treasure he stole from the OGRE, and the tiny hero is working as the royal postman, thanks to his "Seven-League Boots". But TOM THUMB’s brothers and sisters are very worried. Four days ago, the little postman set off to deliver a royal letter and he hasn’t returned. The worst thing is that, in order to reach his destination, TOM THUMB had to go through the sinister forest where the OGRE lives. SANDRA and FO go there and discover that TOM THUMB has again been captured by the OGRE and the OGRE and his wife have invited all the other ogres to a party to celebrate this.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: The Short Report
programme.desc: Everyone is reading a popular blog gossiping about people at school. When the blog post Brains pictures of aliens, she risks having her secret identity exposed.

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: Corky’s Prince
programme.desc: Corky discovers an alien frog who transforms into a handsome boy who is in love with her.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: Gummy’s Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: The Fastest Porter in the Land
programme.desc: Aladdins in big trouble when he forgets to deliver the egg traders eggs to market. Luckily Jamillah brings him a bike. After teaching him how to ride, they head off to deliver the eggs only for them to break them along the way. They eventually have to ask Genie to help by conjuring some eggs. After a few failed attempts it seems he manages it but we discover Genies magic eggs have a surprise inside that delights the customers.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: La familia primero
programme.desc: Los hermanos Olga y Petya deberán enfrentar nuevos desafíos cuando su padre reaparece en sus vidas.

programme.title: La familia primero
programme.desc: Después de sufrir un derrame cerebral, Iván se muda a casa de su hijo, con quien llevaba años sin hablar.

programme.title: Perdóname por amarte
programme.desc: Una ama de casa es culpada de asesinar a la amante de su esposo.

programme.title: Perdóname por amarte
programme.desc: Una ama de casa es culpada de asesinar a la amante de su esposo.

programme.title: Perdóname por amarte
programme.desc: Una ama de casa es culpada de asesinar a la amante de su esposo.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Sabah Al Arabiya
programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Kol Haza Al Hob
programme.desc: Director: Hussein Kamal - Cast: Nour El Sherif / Laila Elwy - Year of production: 1988

programme.title: Ely Bali Balak
programme.desc: Director: Wael Ehsaan - Cast: Mohamed Saad / Abla Kamel - Year of production: 2003_x000D_ يقوم اللمبى بسرقة حقيبة عمه، بحثا عن اوراق التى تثبت احقيته فى ميراث ابيه، تقوم الشرطة بالقبض عليه ويودع السجن، وهناك يكتشف أن المأمور رياض المنفلوطى يشبهه فى الملامح، ينجح اللمبى فى الهروب من السجن، فيقرر رياض مطاردته بنفسه، يحدث صدام بين الدراجة البخارية التى يقودها اللمبى وبين سيارة رياض، وتجرى لهما عملية، يتم نقل مخ اللمبى الى جسد رياض المنفلوطي، ويستغل الضابط ادهم هذه الفرصة من اجل اطلاق سراح سجين وتهريبه خارج مصر مقابل مبلغ كبير من المال. يجد اللمبى نفسه وقد عاش فى بيت المأمور الراحل، ومع زوجته فيحاء، وابنته اشكيناز، ويبدأ فى التحول الى شخص مسئول، يسعى الى القبض على السجين الهارب واعادته الى السجن، تكتشف فيحاء الحقيقة، وانها احبت اللمبي، الذى تصدمه سيارة ويصبح شخصا ثالثاً.

programme.title: Al Mash Mohandis Hassan
programme.desc: Director: Manal Al Sefe - Cast: Mohammad Rajab /Dolly Shahen - Year of production: 2008

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: Insect to Injury 1956
programme.desc: Popeye tries to get rid of termites before they ruin his newly built house.

programme.title: Betty Boop Is My Palm Read -1932
You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: April Maze-1930
programme.desc: Felix the Cat and his two nephews try to have a picnic, but a thunderstorm and a thieving rabbit prevent them.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: tulips shall grow madcap models no. u1-5-1942
The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: The Mummy Strikes 1943
programme.desc: While investigating an egyptologist's mysterious death, Superman must battle dangerous mummies.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: My Dear Secretary 1948
programme.desc: A romance novelist appoints a would-be writer as his secretary. Although she is initially dismayed by his work ethic and playboy attitude, they begin to fall in love

programme.title: Speak Easily 1932
programme.desc: A timid professor inherits a large sum of money and decides to fund a terrible musical

Born to Battle -1935
programme.desc: Good-natured troublemaker "Cyclone" Tom Saunders is hired by a ranchers' association manager to investigate recent cattle rustling at one of their ranches and to see if a pair of nesters have anything to do with it. After discovering the nesters, pretty Betty Powell and her rickety old father, are incapable of rustling, Tom instead turns his attention to the huge, swaggering bully of a foreman, Nate Lenox.

programme.desc: After settling down at a sheep ranch in Hwacheon five years ago, Jin-woo has been raising his niece Seol like his own daughter with his same-sex partner Hyun-min. One day, Jin-woo's twin sister Eun-young who is the birth mother of Seol turns up at their doorstep and insists on taking Seol with her. programme.title: Benjamín Vicuña y Flor Peña en exclusivo + Neuquén Fashion Week 2024 | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Entrevista exclusiva con #florenciapeña y #benjamínvicuña en el lanzamiento de #laisladelastentaciones por #primevideo. - Cobertura exclusiva del #neuquen #fashionweek: hablamos con Verónica de la Canal y Rox nos muestra todo el back del evento y los mejores looks. - Lucía Ugarte entrevista a Sol Macaluso, la periodista argentina que hoy triunfa en Europa. - Visita a #Leblonclinique para aprender sobre lo último en #medicinaestetica.

programme.title: Desayuno y desfile Revista Aló + Hairssime + Colombia Moda 2024 + Estética | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Lucía Ugarte desde el Desayuno de Mujeres Aló @AloRevista. - @HairssimeProfesional lanzó su colección Iconos de Nusense Lumine: hablamos con Guillermina Valdéz, embajadora de la marca, Majo Martino, "Mucho Peluquería", "Guardia House", Maru Gándara, Flor Giberti y Julieta Expósito, técnicas de la marca. - Cobertura exclusiva de #colombiamoda 2024 con Kahren Rondon. - Las últimas tendencias en #dermatologiaestetica con la Dra. Luciana Fernandes.

programme.title: Miami Fashion Week + Porno y Helado + Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos
programme.desc: Miami Fashion Week + Porno y Helado + Cómo Si fuéramos sólo amigos

programme.title: Fiesta de AMÉRICA TV con Pamela David y Ángel de Brito + Relaciones tóxicas | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 30/11/24:
- La fiesta de #AméricaTV en #Miami por los premiados en los #MartínFierro Latinos: Lucía Ugarte celebró junto a Claudia Albertario por #ArgentinosEnMiami y habló con #PamelaDavid y #AngelDeBrito, también ganadores de la noche por Desayuno Americano y #LAM. - Evento de #Profhilo Structura: Potenciá tu belleza natural con lo último en medicina estética para lograr realzar la estructura natural de la piel. - Hablamos con la psicóloga Laura Amicone sobre cómo reconocer una relación tóxica en la pareja. - #YoJefa: conocemos a Vanesa Ruas, la dermatocosmiatra que logra un brillo único en la piel, y nos cuenta los detalles de sus mejores tratamientos faciales.

programme.title: Coolhunting por Palermo + Salud Femenina en el Deporte
programme.desc: Coolhunting por Palermo + Salud Femenina en el Deporte

programme.title: Argentina Fashion Week: Luxury Trends + Antigüedades + Ganadora CG Foundation | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Apertura de #argentinafashionweek con #luxurytrends : hablamos con Vero de la Canal, Jorge Rey, Mario Vidal, Nuria Bueno y Marcelo Senra. -Visitamos Daniel Miranda Antiques, una tienda con antigüedades de lujo que transcienden en el tiempo y elevan tus espacios. - Hablamos con la ganadora del Latina Seed Awards '23, el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation.

programme.title: DESFILE VICTORIA'S SECRET NY + PROPHILO STRUCTURE
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas TV es el primer canal de televisión diseñado exclusivamente para las mujeres audaces de hoy en día. Sumérgete en un mundo lleno de glamour y estilo con nuestras secciones de moda, consejos de viaje irresistibles, experiencias gastronómicas de lujo, secretos de salud y wellness holísticos, inspiradoras entrevistas a mujeres líderes, encuentros con celebridades, deslumbrantes alfombras rojas, tips de belleza y tendencias, eventos exclusivos y mucho más, ¡todo a tu gusto y en un solo lugar!

programme.desc: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink

programme.title: NAOMI SCOTT: estreno de SMILE 2 + Desfile MARIAN SAUD + Yo Jefa | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 09/11/24:
- Entrevista exclusiva de Lucía Ugarte a #NaomiScott por el estreno de #Smile2. - Cobertura del desfile de Marian Saud: Rox habló con la diseñadora y con invitadas de lujo como Candela Ruggeri, #milettfigueroa, Sofía Macaggi, Stephanie Demner y Agustina Casanova. - Tráiler de "Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos", la nueva comedia romántica de Sebastián Badilla y Manu Viale, con Lucía Ugarte como productora ejecutiva. - Lanzamiento de #Skin1004 en Argentina: hablamos con #pampita, Paula Chávez y @SimonScaranoDermatologo. - #YoJefa: la historia de Niki Baratt, la creadora de "Niki beauty bar".

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.

programme.title: Reverse The Ripple
programme.desc: An event is not your identity. In “Reverse The Ripple,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us go back to the source of what we’re going through so we can begin to write a new story for our lives.

programme.title: The Prayer That Repairs
programme.desc: Don’t be so confused about the noise around you that you can’t hear the God who made you. When you’re faced with a struggle you didn’t see coming, remember that Jesus is already praying for you, and His prayer is stronger than any attack.

programme.title: Move It To The Middle
programme.desc: Stressed, insecure, and stuck — that’s how Moses felt, too. But that wasn’t the end of his story, and it’s not yours, either. It’s just the middle. There’s hope past this chapter, and it’s found by shifting your focus back to God.
